harmony.midnightconfig.title: Harmony Config
harmony.midnightconfig.reloadWarning: Some config options will require a game restart to take affect!
harmony.midnightconfig.liquidsDeactivate: Flying through liquids deactivates the Elytra

(Isn't affected by rain) 
When getting into the water, you will automatically get in swim mode
harmony.midnightconfig.exitVehicleOnDama: Mobs exit vehicles when taking damage
harmony.midnightconfig.horseArmorPrevent: Horse armor decreases bucking chance on damage

Horse armor has a chance from preventing the horse from bucking, depending of material: 
 
-Leather: 45% 
-Gold: 60% 
-Iron: 75% 
-Diamond: 90% 
-Netherite (Melody Integration): 100%
harmony.midnightconfig.enderPearlsTelepo: Ender Pearls teleport the entity the player is riding
harmony.midnightconfig.enderPearlsDamage: Ender Pearls damage mounts when teleporting
All entities teleported(passengers and mounts) using an Ender Pearl receive half of the damage the player normally would
harmony.midnightconfig.furnaceMinecartSp:
The speed is relative to the max Minecart speed(2 being 200%, 0.5 being 50% etc.)
The vanilla value is 0.75
Minecart with Furnace speed in water

The speed is relative to the max Minecart speed(2 being 200%, 0.5 being 50% etc.)
The vanilla value is 0.5
harmony.midnightconfig.riptideCooldown.t:
Tridents with riptide cant be used until riptide animation has finished. 
This prevents the player from accumulating acceleration when using the "Riptide Acceleration on Water" feature.
harmony.midnightconfig.riptideTimeMultip:
Increases the time for the riptide animation, during which you will gain acceleration as long as the "Riptide Acceleration on water" feature is enabled. 

The time is calculated the following way: 15+level*multiplier 

Set it to 0 to disable the feature.
harmony.midnightconfig.reduceRiptideWate: Reduce water drag while using a Trident with Riptide
harmony.midnightconfig.glowBerryEffect.t: How long the effect should last in seconds, 0 disables it
harmony.midnightconfig.armorStandStickAr: Armor Stands can be equipped with arms using a Stick
Arms can be removed with shears
harmony.midnightconfig.armorStandSticks: Number of sticks required to equip Armor Stands with arms
harmony.midnightconfig.oneTickCopperBulb: Copper Bulbs have a 1 tick delay
harmony.midnightconfig.removeRedstoneLam: Removes the 4 tick delay for redstone lamps to turn off
harmony.midnightconfig.beaconsAffectTame: Beacon effects apply to tamed animals as well as players.
harmony.midnightconfig.tridentsReturnFro: Tridents with Loyalty return from the void
harmony.midnightconfig.changeItemDespawn: Change items despawn time depending on difficulty
harmony.midnightconfig.itemDespawnTimeEa: Time for dropped items to despawn in easy/peaceful.
harmony.midnightconfig.itemDespawnTimeNo: Time for dropped items to despawn in normal.
harmony.midnightconfig.itemDespawnTimeHa: Time for dropped items to despawn in hard.
harmony.midnightconfig.wolvesGrowlAtMons: Tamed wolves growl at nearby monsters.
harmony.midnightconfig.permissiveParrotP: Sneak and unsneak quickly for your parrot to fly off of you.
harmony.midnightconfig.mismatchedMobArmo: Mobs can spawn with mismatched armor materials.
harmony.midnightconfig.husksDropSandOnCo: Husks drop sand when converting into zombies.
